body_html:
Can someone verify that the supported build process does not work for them with a recent version of tensorflow and bazel? It is true that master does sometimes break, and there's usually no need to build from master. Checking out r0.7 and building that should not cause any trouble.

Also, we do have a nascent (and currently broken) cmake build (in contrib/cmake), if anyone is interested in contributing to it, we'd welcome that.

body:
Can someone verify that the supported build process does not work for them with a recent version of tensorflow and bazel? It is true that master does sometimes break, and there's usually no need to build from master. Checking out r0.7 and building that should not cause any trouble.

Also, we do have a nascent (and currently broken) cmake build (in contrib/cmake), if anyone is interested in contributing to it, we'd welcome that.
